<title level="1" right="Rules">[Crafting and Treasure](/Rules.aspx?ID=1448)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The second portion of this chapter consists of a catalog of new alchemical items, snares, and both consumable and permanent magic items, including runes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
